mapper.insert: insert into ms_funding_product( user_pk, product_name, simple_explain, title_image, explain_image, start_date, finish_date, price, amount, success_fail ) values ( #{user_pk}, #{product_name}, #{simple_explain}, #{title_image}, #{explain_image}, #{start_date}, #{finish_date}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{success_fail} )
mapper.select: select * from ms_funding_product order by product_pk desc
select DATEDIFF(finish_date,now()) from ms_funding_product where product_pk=#{product_pk}
